TopicTitle: KSP Forums Favourite NFL Team Poll.

Articles.Content:
Just curious to see what NFL teams the people here support. If you like more than one, try to pick your favourite.

It's the middle of the off-season, I miss it...

Due to the forums 10 option limit on polls, vote here: [http://www.poll-maker.com/poll339385x37D04C37-13](http://www.poll-maker.com/poll339385x37D04C37-13)

results viewable here: [http://www.poll-maker.com/results339385x6c4f32E8-13](http://www.poll-maker.com/results339385x6c4f32E8-13)
We don't follow NFL here. NCAA college football is another story however!
What order did you put these in?!

> 
> What order did you put these in?!

Did the NFC East, West, North, South, then I started the AFC in the same ordering convention.

I realize a lot of us here are science nerds, but it seems not alot of people here follow an NFL team.

My office is right next to the Jets training facility (the kind of “we can see them train” next). At the end of the summer they have this open house thing where fans can watch them train. It involves loud music all day long (of which we only here the bass). GO GIANTS!!
